There is Zionist plot meant to clash Jews and Arabs that is unfolding now before our eyes!

Only two of them were made known to me - Gusinsky and Berezovsky. I guess that's because they are already widely known as quite notorious persons. 
 Fancy the two are also planning to organize exhibitions throughout Europe to show whole series of caricatures to wide public! I am just speechless. 
 Well, I am sure we must show to wide public not those damned cartoons but the rest shady players in the risky story! And I am absolutely sure there must be some international exploration into this whole story! Those to blame are to be brought into the courtroom the sooner the better.
